--- login ----
1. config ./libs/soapconfig.php ve duong dan tuong ung tren svr
	+ OAUTH_CALLBACK
	+ CLIENT_CALLBACK
	+ LOGOUT_URL
	
2. chinh ./client.js ve duong dan tuong ung tren svr
	+ callback
	+ callback_post_feed
	+ callback_request_feed
	+ pay_redirect
3. chay duong dan /soap/request.php


--- payment ---
	+ duong dan/payment-callback.php la demo hoat dong cua backend-callback o phia game/app
	+ Gui duong location toi file nay cho Soha Game de dang ky duong dan payment-callback (vi du http://your-app-url/payment/payment-callback.php)
